ARABIC: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and to warn those who say 'Allah has a son.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And that it may warn those who say: "God has begotten a son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and also to warn those who say: "Allah has taken to Himself a son,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and admonish those who say that God has begotten a son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to warn those who say “Allah has chosen a child.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to warn those who say, "Allah has begotten a child."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And warn those who say: Allah has taken a son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and to warn those who say, 'God has taken to Himself a son';
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And to warn those who say: Allah hath chosen a son,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And to warn those who say, "God has taken to Himself a son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that it may warn those who say: God hath taken a son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and to warn those who say, ‘Allah has taken a son.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Further, that He may warn those (also) who say, "Allah hath begotten a son":
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to warn those (Jews, Christians, and pagans) who say, "Allah has begotten a son (or offspring or children)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And it (the Koran) warns those who say: 'Allah has taken a son'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And to warn those who say, “God has begotten a son.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:4] and to warn those, from among the disbelievers, who say, ‘God has taken a son’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And to warn) and so that Muhammad (pbuh) warns by means of the Qur'an (those who say: Allah hath chosen a son) i.e. the Jews, Christians and idolaters,
